Background: Originally a meek housewife, Carol overcomes domestic abuse to become a skilled, resourceful fighter capable of making difficult decisions.[30][31]
The group's primary hunter, Daryl becomes a key member of the group and Rick's trusted lieutenant.[28][29]
The eldest daughter of the Greene family, Maggie marries Glenn, becomes pregnant with their child and becomes the leader of the Hilltop Colony.[32][33]
The series' former protagonist and a former sheriff's deputy, Rick is the leader of a group of survivors who becomes the leader of the Alexandria Safe Zone.[14][15]

A fierce, katana-wielding woman who joins Rick's group. Michonne eventually becomes Rick's romantic partner and a mother-figure to his son, Carl. She is also the mother-figure to Judith, daughter of Lori and Shane.[34][35]
The fiery yet compassionate daughter of Madison, and Nick's sister.[2][20]
A man who claims to know a cure for the walker virus, Eugene is cowardly and inefficient when dealing with walkers, but is very intelligent.[50][51]
A smart and sophisticated conman-turned-businessman, who forms friendships with the Clark family.[24]
A recruiter who invites Rick's group to Alexandria.[64][65]
A courageous and pragmatic former Sombra Negra member, a barber, Griselda's husband, and Ofelia's father.[2][23]
A priest who joins Rick's group. He lacks experience with walkers and struggles with his faith in the new world.[58][59]
A strong and cautious former member of the La Colonia community in Tijuana, Mexico, and Nick's girlfriend.[26]
An intelligent and domineering guidance counselor, the mother of Nick and Alicia, and Travis' fianc√©e.[2][20][18]
The totalitarian, sociopathic leader of the Saviors.[70][71]
The "king" of a community known as the Kingdom, Ezekiel is a former zookeeper with a pet Bengal tiger called Shiva.[78][79]
A member of the Kingdom and Ezekiel's steward.[96][97]
A kind and mysterious nurse encountered by Madison who has a history with John.[29]
A curious and tactical journalist who encounters Morgan and John.[29]
The adoptive sister of Wendell and a former U.S. Marine.[33][34]
Dwight's long-missing ex-wife who fled across the country to Texas after escaping the Saviors on The Walking Dead.[35]
A deaf member of Magna's group and Kelly's sister.[104][105]
The biological daughter of Lori and Shane who was adopted by Rick after she was born.[100][101]
Connie's alert and protective sister who has a gradual hearing loss.[111]
Alpha's daughter and former Whisperer.[102][103]
The feisty leader of a small group of roaming survivors and Yumiko's girlfriend.[98][99]
A resident of the Commonwealth who communicated with Eugene over the radio. She is also Mercer's younger sister.[110]
Magna's girlfriend who is a proficient archer and former criminal defense lawyer.[94][95]
A quirky and flamboyant survivor who has suffered various traumas in her past and later joins Eugene's group.[106]
A resident of the Commonwealth who serves as the general of the Commonwealth military.[107]
The governor of the Commonwealth.[109]
